hairstyles.name: Long Layered Cut
hairstyles.description: Long layers that add vertical lines to elongate a round face. Creates a slimming effect while adding movement.
tips: Ask for face-framing layers starting below chin

hairstyles.name: Side-Swept Bangs
hairstyles.description: Angled bangs that sweep across the forehead create diagonal lines that slim and lengthen round faces.
tips: Can be worn with any length

hairstyles.name: Asymmetrical Bob
hairstyles.description: An edgy bob with one side longer than the other. The asymmetry creates angles that complement round faces.
tips: Keep the longer side past chin level

hairstyles.name: High Ponytail
hairstyles.description: A high ponytail adds height at the crown, creating vertical balance that elongates round faces.

hairstyles.name: Long Side Part
hairstyles.description: A deep side part creates an elongating diagonal line across the face, flattering round face shapes.
tips: Works with straight or wavy hair

hairstyles.name: Textured Lob
hairstyles.description: A long bob with textured ends that adds movement and avoids the roundness of blunt cuts.

hairstyles.name: Voluminous Crown
hairstyles.description: Height and volume at the crown elongates round faces and adds sophistication.

hairstyles.name: Wispy Fringe
hairstyles.description: Light, wispy bangs that soften the face without adding width. More flattering than blunt bangs for round faces.

hairstyles.name: Sleek Low Bun
hairstyles.description: A polished low bun with volume at the crown creates an elegant, elongating effect.
tips: Add height at crown before securing

hairstyles.name: Long Waves
hairstyles.description: Soft, flowing waves that create vertical lines and movement, perfect for elongating round faces.

hairstyles.name: Angular Bob
hairstyles.description: A bob cut at an angle - shorter in back, longer in front - creates slimming lines for round faces.

hairstyles.name: Center Part Straight
hairstyles.description: A sleek center part with long straight hair creates strong vertical lines that slim round faces.

hairstyles.name: Layered Shag
hairstyles.description: A modern shag with lots of layers adds height and movement, creating flattering proportions for round faces.

hairstyles.name: Braided Crown
hairstyles.description: A crown braid adds height at the top of the head, elongating round faces elegantly.

hairstyles.name: Soft Layers
hairstyles.description: Gentle, face-framing layers that add movement without adding width. Perfect for everyday elegance.
